nodes.long_description:
# 3D Coverage Everywhere
- Almost all recognizable cities on Earth are available in True 3D, so you'll likely even be able to visit your own street in Immersive 3D & Street View
- Best 3D Earth quality on the market, enhanced by the **AI-powered ’Upscale 3D Imagery’** feature
# Street View
- Adjustable 8k quality w/ the best rendering fidelity on the platform, offering every **Google** and **Community** Imagery on Earth
- Travel across timelines w/ the Time Travel feature
# Multiplayer
- Explore w/ friends!
# (Add-on) EarthQuest AI can
- Naturally respond in YOUR OWN language
- Visualize & understand your surroundings on Earth for educational purposes or to simply give fun facts
- Tour you anywhere on Earth if asked
- .. + Much more
# Realistic Graphics
- Natural lighting based on the adjustable day/night cycle
- Lifelike, adaptive Haze option
# Terrain Quality
- 3D quality is fully adjustable, producing realistic 3D by pushing it to extreme detail w/ the best possible performance
# Comfort Settings
- Comfort Options (Snap Turning/Flight Vignette) to prevent motion sickness
- Flight Input Remapping (Customizable Movement Controls)
# Easy Navigation
- Mini-map: auto/manual zoom based on altitude, paired w/ the compass for orientation
- Integrated Google Maps panel
# Hand Tracking
- Fly by simply pointing your index finger
- Rotate by doing a "Steering" gesture w/ your own hands

—

Plus 100s of other features built to enhance the experience in all possible ways. Bon voyage! 🌍
nodes.short_description:
The ENTIRE Earth in True 3D, and every 360 on the planet - ( The Best 3D & Street View Quality on the Market )
—
for more info, see:
earthquest.site

nodes.long_description:
Quest 2 Game made in Unity with the Cesium Package using the Google Earth Photogrammetry 3d Tiles.

---------------------------------------------
UPDATE v10 !! : hopefully the MOST STABLE and the Update that Simplified the Flight Controlling Mechanic the Most, v10 is meant to finalize the heavy game development for a month or two, however, fixes and improvements will still come if there are any needs for it. this Update adds Controller SUPPORT!!! basically the rest is self explanatory, the update also fixes a bug that due to the collider removal and raycast to prevent going through mesh, even if the Earth's Mesh was not visible in Space, it was still there, so the raycast stopped Player Movement when trying to go down, this was Fortunately FIXED!,

v10.2: the Controllers are now Able to Type on Keyboard to Search and Teleport to a specific Place on Earth, and fixed a bug where the space bar touch collider was small,

v10.3: when you pressed on some specific ui buttons, the code gave an error and every other ui stopped working since they had the same script. this was fixed. 3d Earth Generation to have better quality and faster performance, also loading faster and in larger quantity, we'll have to know if that's the case, if not we'll have to redo the changes in v10.4 :/, another improvement was that flight speed adjustment based on altitude was not efficient, and sometimes caused teleporting instead of flying smoothly, fixed !
https://youtu.be/6s-jkai4_mA
---------------------
nodes.short_description: geography teaching hand tracking passthrough VR app/game on Quest 2 Quest Pro, and Quest 3

nodes.change_log:
v45 is LIVE! 06/23/2025 🌍🌐

EarthQuest is already an incredibly magical experience with endless content and adventures awaiting daily, but what if we raise the bar once again and unlock a whole new chapter of traveling and exploration, making the impossible accessible to everyone?

v45 is probably the biggest update yet, take a look:

# Street View Time Travel 🧭 ⬇️

- You can now intuitively travel to the past and back into the future within EVERY Street View Timeline!

- Street View Timeline navigation should also be 100% consistent - keeping the target date while navigating. And unlike on Google Maps, if a street doesn’t have the previous target data, the next date will be loaded, instead of a randomly selected date!

# Other Street View Updates ⬇️

- All menus are now usable in Street View! This was originally only available for Hand Tracking, but it is now implemented intuitively for Controllers Tracking as well! Whether you want to use the maps, see the address, save bookmarks, search for a place, or anything else - all can be done directly in Street View! 🥽

- Street View navigation overhaul, with this rethought navigation system, loading times can now get up to 2-3 times faster! ⚡️ (Loading times are now guaranteed to be as fast as technically possible)

- The system also allows viewing all nearby imagery points for precise selection. To maintain full immersion, these points appear as soft round ground shadows, subtly lighting up and dissolving when hovered over to indicate selection.

# Automatic Street View Bubble Preview ⬇️ 

- The Street View Bubble will now automatically update every time you stop moving, allowing you to preview Street View / Community Imagery before loading them in full resolution! 🫧

# Other Updates ⬇️ 

- When teleporting and when first loading in, EarthQuest will now automatically boost ‘Terrain Loading Strength’ temporarily to download the terrain much faster until it loads.

- The mini-map and enlarged map both now support one more level of zoom-in and zoom-out, allowing even greater location detail far away / up-close. 🔍

- Very special new soundtrack for this very special update, give it a listen here - https://youtu.be/H1tEUToVknE

- Thanks to the anti-OOB (out-of-bounds prevention) system from the previous updates that solves unwanted experiences, flight boosting will now fully be available in space, even when close to Earth.

- Improved memory allocation stability. ⚖️

- Very subtle sunrise / sunset warm color and reflection adjustments for contrast & realism. ☀️

- Small Main Menu (Hub) Settings rewording and color theme updates. 🎨

- Smoother automatic altitude flight speed adjustment, avoiding sudden deceleration / acceleration and producing more natural flight motion (previously noticeable when flying above very tall buildings).

- Fixed tons of potential bugs and tiny issues. 🔧

- And more! Join the community to see the full changelog - contact.earthquest.site

——

This is a huge update, I’ve tested everything as well as I could, but if you encounter ANYTHING that you might think isn’t 100% intentional, please let me know AS SOON AS POSSIBLE !
( contact.earthquest.site )
